description: This file defines a coursesService object providing methods to list, get, enroll, start, and complete courses, with support for both API calls and Supabase database interactions. It manages course data, user enrollment, progress, and status updates.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Retrieves a list of courses available to the current user, including enrollment and progress status if in Supabase mode.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Fetches detailed information about a specific course, including user enrollment and progress status.

methods.name: enroll
methods.description: Enrolls the current user into a specified course.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Marks a course as started for the current user and updates enrollment and progress status.

methods.name: complete
methods.description: Marks a course as completed for the current user and updates enrollment and progress status.
